Package gameLogic

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Merchandise
    The Merchandise interface represents any item that can be sold in the General Store Last modified: 1-5-20 by Dmitri Smith Created: 28-4-20
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animal  
    Crop  
    Farm
    The Farm class holds information of what the player currently owns, their statuses such as actions remaining or any health, money, growth boosts.
    Farmer
    The Farmer class holds the name and age of the player's character, the farmer.
    GameEnvironment
    Contains methods to run the farm game.
    GeneralStore
    The GeneralStore class is where the player can view or purchase available merchandise.
    Item  
    MerchandiseWrapper  
    ModifierWrapper  
    ShoppingCart
    ShoppingCart is a class that keeps track of what the merch player wants to buy and the cost of it.
    Welcome  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FarmType
    The FarmType is an enumerator that provides four options for the types of farms the player can select.
    PossibleAction
